Fast delivery of equipment from stock or: Ombordan yoki buyurtma asosida uskunalarni tez yetkazib berish
Installation of equipment and training o: Uskunalarni o'rnatish va xodimlarni u bilan ishlashga o'rgatish
We carry out prompt registration of new: Yangi uskunalarni tez ro'yxatga olishni amalga oshiramiz
Warranty and post-warranty service of su: Yetkazib berilgan uskunalarga kafolat va kafolatdan keyingi xizmat ko'rsatish
